content.question: According to the sentence, which of the following best describes the teacher’s actions?

choices.label: After the teacher explained what the students had read, the students still did not understand it.
The teacher chose an obscure story for the students to read because they were very intelligent.
The teacher explained a few things so that all the students understood the story they were about to read.
The students read a story but didn’t understand all of it, so the teacher explained some obscure things.

content.answer: The students read a story but didn’t understand all of it, so the teacher explained some obscure things.
